resources.string: Hydraulic circuit purging and piston maintenance.
Visual inspection of disc pads for wear or damage. Replace if necessary..
Visual inspection of cable housings for wear or damage. Replace if necessary.
Check the wear of the cassette. Consider replacing if it shows excessive wear or hinders gear shifting.
Check the wear of the disc brakes. Consider replacing if they are worn or deformed.
Check and lubricate the adjustable seatpost. Ensure proper functioning without play or lockout.
"Check and maintain the fork according to the manufacturer\'s recommendations.
Check the condition and lubrication of the front hub.
Check and maintain the rear suspension according to the manufacturer\'s recommendations.
Check the condition and proper tightening of the thru axle.
Check the tread wear of the tires. Consider replacing if they are worn.
Inspect the condition of wheels and spokes every 1000 km. Ensure they are properly tensioned and free from visible damage.
Inspect the tread wear of the tires every 4000 km. Consider replacing if they are worn.
